data.message:
Facebook I'm journalist
I tried all ways to verify my account but i can't 
could you help me ,please ?

replies.message: Hi Ahmed. If you're an admin of a local business Page, you may be eligible for a gray verification badge, which you'll see in your Page's settings. Learn more: http://on.fb.me/1Rnv60v. If your Page represents a celebrity, public figure, sports team, media or entertainment, you may be eligible for a blue verification badge. To see if your Page is eligible, please fill out this form: http://on.fb.me/1V22qJq. -Abby

Facebook I have Problem , i can't verify my account in my area .  i verified my channel on youtube and i want to verify my account facebook too.   this is my Youtube Channel Link ↓ (https://www.youtube.com/ahmed_alnasre)
: http://on.fb.me/1V22qJq - The link says the page is not available.
